arts.ttl: Aston Villa team news as Unai Emery makes ONE change against Liverpool
arts.sum: Manager Unai Emery has named his team for Aston Villa’s Premier League match against Liverpool this evening. Villa will attempt to extend their winning run in the Premier League to five matches at Anfield while Liverpool, whose form has been a long way short of the performances that won them the league in 2024/25, want [...] The post Aston Villa team news as Unai Emery makes ONE change against Liverpool appeared first on AVillaFan.com – Aston Villa Fan Site.

arts.ttl: Liverpool v Aston Villa: Premier League – live
arts.sum: ⚽️ Premier League updates from this 8pm GMT kick-off ⚽️ Live scores | Premier League table | Follow us on Bluesky Arne Slot makes three changes from last Saturday’s defeat at Brentford. Andy Robertson replaces the struggling Milos Kerkez at left-back; Ryan Gravenberch and Alexis Mac Allister come in for Curtis Jones and Florian Wirtz. Just one changed to the Villa side that beat Manchester City: Evann Guessand comes in for the injured Emi Buendia. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Gravenberch back for Liverpool vs Aston Villa LIVE!
arts.sum: Liverpool head coach Arne Slot says Ryan Gravenberch could return to his squad for the visit of Aston Villa on Saturday - but Alexander Isak and Curtis Jones are set to miss out. "Ryan trained with us yesterday," said Slot.
